News aggregated and shorten to save your precious time!

  • HOW JURGEN KLOPP'S LIVERPOOL RESPOND TO BIG DEFEATS, AFTER CHAMPIONS LEAGUE SHOCKER AGAINST NAPOLI

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11205773/How-Jurgen-Klopps-Liverpool-respond-big-defeats-Champions-League-shocker-against-Napoli.html

    09/13/2022, 21:02

    83.33% Shortened!

    We have to be better in pretty much everything,' said a disconsolate Jurgen Klopp in Naples last Wednseday.  A dismal Liverpool had just been thrashed 4-1 by Napoli in their first Champions League group game of the season after being blown away in the first half by the Italian side

    This included a memorable 4-3 win over City at Anfield to exact revenge on their defeat earlier that season

    A Harry Kane-inspired Tottenham inflicted another huge defeat on Liverpool in 2017 Liverpool bounced back with a 3-0 win over Huddersfield to spark an 18-match unbeaten run The defeat - Barcelona 3 - 0 Liverpool - May 1 2019 A Lionel Messi masterclass meant Liverpool succumbed to a heavy defeat by the Spanish giants that left their Champions League hopes hanging by a thread

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/13/igp-mutual-legal-assistance-request-sent-to-singapore-over-tawfiq-ayman039s-case

    09/13/2022, 20:04

    62.5% Shortened!

    In March, several witnesses in Singapore had agreed to cooperate with the ongoing investigation into 1MDB, especially involving Tawfiq

    Tawfiq is also being investigated by the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) in an ongoing probe

    Its chief commissioner Tan Sri Azam Baki had said his agency's task in the matter was to repatriate funds from Singapore, while the police were conducting the criminal probe

    In March last year, it was reported that Tawfiq was being investigated by the police after 1MDB-linked funds were said to have been transferred to his Singapore-based bank account

    Acryl Sani Abdullah Sani

    Report it to us

  • QUEEN ELIZABETH'S FUNERAL: NO INVITES FOR RUSSIA, BELARUS AND MYANMAR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/09/13/queen-elizabeth039s-funeral-no-invites-for-russia-belarus-and-myanmar

    09/13/2022, 20:02

    75.0% Shortened!

    Britain's King Charles and Queen Camilla greet people as they arrive at Hillsborough Castle, following the death of Queen Elizabeth, at Royal Hillsborough, Northern Ireland, on Tuesday, September 13, 2022

    For most countries, the invitation extends to the head of state plus a guest

    However, the leaders of Russia, Belarus and Myanmar have not received an invite

    US president Joe Biden was among the first to declare he would be flying in with his wife, Jill Biden

    King Felipe of Spain and his wife, Queen Letizia, are among the European royals who will attend

    Downing Street on Monday refused to comment on reports that world leaders visiting London for the Queen's state funeral have been asked to travel on commercial flights and will be bussed to Westminster Abbey

    The Queen's coffin will remain in Westminster Hall until Monday, when it will be taken in procession from the Palace of Westminster to Westminster Abbey for the funeral service

    ['queen', 'london', 'state', 'funeral', 'westminster']

    Britain's King Charles and Queen Camilla greet people as they arrive at Hillsborough Castle, following the death of Queen Elizabeth, at Royal Hillsborough, Northern Ireland, on Tuesday, September 13, 2022

    For most countries, the invitation extends to the head of state plus a guest

    However, the leaders of Russia, Belarus and Myanmar have not received an invite

    US president Joe Biden was among the first to declare he would be flying in with his wife, Jill Biden

    King Felipe of Spain and his wife, Queen Letizia, are among the European royals who will attend

    Downing Street on Monday refused to comment on reports that world leaders visiting London for the Queen's state funeral have been asked to travel on commercial flights and will be bussed to Westminster Abbey

    The Queen's coffin will remain in Westminster Hall until Monday, when it will be taken in procession from the Palace of Westminster to Westminster Abbey for the funeral service

    ['queen', 'london', 'state', 'funeral', 'westminster']

    Rudy had answered “I am not sure” when asked by Rakhbir during cross-examination if the report was false

  • WHY CHARGE EDITORS OVER ARTICLES THAT HAD EXPOSED STOCK MARKET MANIPULATION?

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/why-charge-editors-over-articles-had-exposed-stock-market-manipulation

    09/13/2022, 18:04

    45.45% Shortened!

    When we were informed yesterday (Sept 12) by ASP Mohd Adnan Alias of the Brickfields District Police that the Deputy Public Prosecutor’s (DPP) Office of Kuala Lumpur had directed that charges be filed against two of our editors, Azam Aris and M Shanmugam, we were shocked that they were intervening in what, if anything at all, is essentially a civil dispute

    However, the losses would have been much more had the manipulation continued in a big way

    As a media that reports on the stock market and corporate sector extensively, we have a responsibility to highlight important matters to the investing public — including alerting them about how stock prices are being manipulated

    We are, therefore, baffled as to why the police and the DPP’s Office of Kuala Lumpur are pressing criminal defamation charges against us for informing investors about stock market manipulation

    Where is the defamation? If the complainant, who is a private businessman, feels that we have defamed him, the police and DPP should ask him to file a civil suit against us instead of using public resources

    The Edge former editor-in-chief charged with criminal defamation for reporting abnormal penny stocks surge

    ['search', 'edge', 'stock', 'editor', 'charge']

    When we were informed yesterday (Sept 12) by ASP Mohd Adnan Alias of the Brickfields District Police that the Deputy Public Prosecutor’s (DPP) Office of Kuala Lumpur had directed that charges be filed against two of our editors, Azam Aris and M Shanmugam, we were shocked that they were intervening in what, if anything at all, is essentially a civil dispute

    However, the losses would have been much more had the manipulation continued in a big way

    As a media that reports on the stock market and corporate sector extensively, we have a responsibility to highlight important matters to the investing public — including alerting them about how stock prices are being manipulated

    We are, therefore, baffled as to why the police and the DPP’s Office of Kuala Lumpur are pressing criminal defamation charges against us for informing investors about stock market manipulation

    Where is the defamation? If the complainant, who is a private businessman, feels that we have defamed him, the police and DPP should ask him to file a civil suit against us instead of using public resources

    The Edge former editor-in-chief charged with criminal defamation for reporting abnormal penny stocks surge

    ['search', 'edge', 'stock', 'editor', 'charge']



  • NO MORE SUMMONSES FOR NOT USING FACE MASKS IN PUBLIC, SAYS NOOR AZMI

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/13/no-more-summonses-for-not-using-face-masks-in-public-says-noor-azmi

    09/13/2022, 18:04

    50.0% Shortened!

    Deputy Health Minister Datuk Dr Noor Azmi Ghazali said this was because the use of face masks indoors is now optional (except in certain situations)

    On Sept 7, Health Minister Khairy Jamaluddin announced that the use of face masks indoors was now optional but that premises owners could still decide if visitors are required to wear one

    According to him, the declaration depends on the World Health Organisation (WHO), which determines the endemic phase status of a country

    "We previously entered the transition to endemic phase because there were still reported cases of Covid-19 and there are things we still have to take care of and control," he said

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • MEGHAN PAUSES PODCAST DURING MOURNING FOR QUEEN ELIZABETH

    https://www.thestar.com.my/lifestyle/entertainment/2022/09/13/meghan-pauses-podcast-during-mourning-for-queen-elizabeth

    09/13/2022, 18:02

    41.67% Shortened!

    Meghan's podcast, which is called 'Archetypes' and has so far featured American singer Mariah Carey and tennis player Serena Williams as guests

    Earlier in the day, her husband Prince Harry paid a highly personal tribute to the late queen, saying how he cherished the time he had spent with his grandmother and promising to honour his father King Charles as the new monarch

    Harry and Meghan stepped down from royal duties in 2020, and have since become alienated from the family and delivered withering criticism of Buckingham Palace and how they had been treated

    Meghan's podcast, which is called Archetypes and has so far featured American singer Mariah Carey and tennis player Serena Williams as guests, looks at the "labels that try to hold women back", according to its Spotify description

    The royal, who was formerly known as Meghan Markle, starred in television legal drama Suits before her marriage to Harry

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • LIVERPOOL TRIED TO SIGN REAL MADRID MIDFIELDER FEDERICO VALVERDE FOR £86.5M

    https://www.dailymail.co.uk/sport/football/article-11205557/Liverpool-tried-sign-Real-Madrid-midfielder-Federico-Valverde-86-5m.html

    09/13/2022, 17:04

    50.0% Shortened!

    The Uruguayan has been linked with a move to Anfield numerous times in the past and it's been claimed Jurgen Klopp opted to make a move for the Los Blancos star this summer

    Liverpool tried to pull off a last-minute £86.5million deal for Real Madrid's Federico Valverde The Uruguayan midfielder has been linked with a move to Anfield numerous times in the past Liverpool made a bid of £86.5million in the final two days of the summer transfer window, according to Diario AS.  The same report, however, suggests that the Spanish giants rejected the offer as they found it 'brutal' and 'offensive' - dismissing they would sell the star, let alone that late in the transfer window

    Real Madrid clearly found the offer unacceptable, despite the fact that fee would have made Valverde the second most expensive sale at the club ever, only surpassed by the sale of Cristiano Ronaldo to Juventus in 2018

    Boss Jurgen Klopp missed out on his target and instead signed Juventus' Arthur Melo on loan Valverde remains under contract with Real until the summer of 2027, after only just extending his contract last summer

    Reds boss Jurgen Klopp missed out on his target and ended up signing Juventus midfielder Arthur Melo on a season-long loan deal, with the option to buy the Brazilian for £32m

    Arthur Melo has completed his season-long loan move from Juventus to join Liverpool  Liverpool also paid a loan fee of £3.9m to secure the services of the 26-year-old to help ease the crisis in midfield

    ['liverpool', 'make', 'real', 'madrid', 'midfielder']

    The Uruguayan has been linked with a move to Anfield numerous times in the past and it's been claimed Jurgen Klopp opted to make a move for the Los Blancos star this summer

    Real Madrid clearly found the offer unacceptable, despite the fact that fee would have made Valverde the second most expensive sale at the club ever, only surpassed by the sale of Cristiano Ronaldo to Juventus in 2018

  • DEPUTY MINISTER AHMAD AMZAD RUSHED TO HOSPITAL MIDWAY THROUGH HIKING EVENT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/13/deputy-minister-ahmad-amzad-rushed-to-hospital-midway-through-hiking-event

    09/13/2022, 17:04

    45.45% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 13 Sep 2022

    The Kuala Terengganu MP is believed to have had suffered breathing difficulties while climbing the 156m mountain together with more than 400 participants during the programme organised by his parliamentary constituency, in collaboration with the Kuala Terengganu Information Office

    Ahmad Amzad was sent to the Sultanah Nur Zahirah Hospital (HSNZ) and it is learnt that he is in stable condition

    He will remain in hospital for observation and is expected to be discharged later Tuesday evening

    Meanwhile, Terengganu Information Department deputy director, Saharrudin Mohamed, who was also present at the programme, said Ahmad Amzad was scheduled to officiate the programme once the event was completed

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['kuala', 'terengganu', 'ahmad', 'amzad', 'hospital']

  • DEFAMATION SUIT: DR MAHATHIR CLAIMS ZAHID DELIBERATELY RAISED RACIAL ISSUES

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/13/defamation-suit-dr-mahathir-claims-zahid-deliberately-raised-racial-issues/28040

    09/13/2022, 17:04

    45.45% Shortened!

    Dr Mahathir, 97, as the plaintiff said his ancestry does not make him “less Malay” or “non-Malay”

    “This was also brought up by the defendant (Ahmad Zahid) only after I was no longer with Umno, which clearly shows the defendant’s motives and bad intentions,” claimed Dr Mahathir in response to Ahmad Zahid’s defence statement, which was filed on September 8

    Dr Mahathir filed a lawsuit against Ahmad Zahid, 69, on July 20 for allegedly issuing defamatory statements regarding the “kutty” issue

    Dr Mahathir claimed that the defendant also failed to take appropriate and reasonable measures to obtain explanations from him before making the slanderous statement

    In his statement of claim, Dr Mahathir claimed that Ahmad Zahid had issued a defamatory statement against him during the Umno divisional meeting in Kelana Jaya on July 30, 2017, and the statement was reproduced on Astro Awani’s YouTube and several online news portals, which can be accessed by internet users without any restrictions

    He claimed that the slanderous statement meant that he was not born as a Malay or a Muslim with the alleged original name of “Mahathir son of Iskandar Kutty” and that he claimed to be a Malay when he became prime minister to gain political and personal advantage apart from belittling Malaysians of Indian Muslim descent

    ['mahathir', 'claimed', 'ahmad', 'zahid', 'issue']

    Dr Mahathir, 97, as the plaintiff said his ancestry does not make him “less Malay” or “non-Malay”

    Dr Mahathir filed a lawsuit against Ahmad Zahid, 69, on July 20 for allegedly issuing defamatory statements regarding the “kutty” issue

    Dr Mahathir claimed that the defendant also failed to take appropriate and reasonable measures to obtain explanations from him before making the slanderous statement

    In his statement of claim, Dr Mahathir claimed that Ahmad Zahid had issued a defamatory statement against him during the Umno divisional meeting in Kelana Jaya on July 30, 2017, and the statement was reproduced on Astro Awani’s YouTube and several online news portals, which can be accessed by internet users without any restrictions

    He claimed that the slanderous statement meant that he was not born as a Malay or a Muslim with the alleged original name of “Mahathir son of Iskandar Kutty” and that he claimed to be a Malay when he became prime minister to gain political and personal advantage apart from belittling Malaysians of Indian Muslim descent

    ['mahathir', 'claimed', 'ahmad', 'zahid', 'issue']

    Therefore, Rajsurian requested bail without surety, or the lowest possible bail of RM500-RM1,000 for Ahmad Azam, as bail is not meant to be a punishment for the accused

    Nurshahira allowed a bail of RM500 with one bailor, while Zhafran allowed a bail of RM2,500 with one bailor

  • KING SIHAMONI, QUEEN MOTHER SEND LETTER TO KING CHARLES III

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2022/09/13/king-sihamoni-queen-mother-send-letter-to-king-charles-iii

    09/13/2022, 15:02

    53.33% Shortened!

    - ROYAL DU CAMBODGE

    “On the auspicious occasion of Your Majesty’s official proclamation as King of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland by the Accession Council, I would like to extend to Your Majesty my warmest congratulations and best wishes for Your Majesty’s future wellbeing as well as for the great prosperity of your country and happiness of all your loyal subjects,” King Sihamoni stated in the letter dated Sept 12

    The Prince of Wales was proclaimed King Charles III on Sept 10 after Queen Elizabeth II passed away two days prior at the age of 96

    On Sept 12, Prime Minister Hun Sen paid tribute to the late Queen Elizabeth II at the British embassy in Phnom Penh, writing in their condolences book that he was filled with "profound grief" to have learned of the passing of the Queen at Balmoral Castle in Scotland

    He said the demise of Queen Elizabeth II was not only a great loss to the UK and the Commonwealth, but also to the world at large

    The late Queen, Hun Sen wrote, emerged as a beloved public figure through her reign, her discipline and the ways she inspired people and that she will forever be remembered in the hearts of all of the British people and the hearts of many others around the world

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['king', 'sihamoni', 'queen', 'great', 'elizabeth']

    Besides Zuraida and Choong, PBM currently has a total of four federal lawmakers including the party’s president Larry Sng, who is Julau MP as well as Lahad Datu MP Datuk Mohamaddin Ketapi

    “Joining the BN coalition is important for the party’s lawmakers because their reputation has dampened with all the party hopping

    “I think the best that Barisan Nasional can do for PBM is not to accept it fully as part of its coalition but rather as an ally,” he added

    Previously, Zuraida had announced that PBM will contest a total of 14 seats, consisting of seven federal and seven state seats, for the upcoming GE15

    She said the seats in question were all won by the party’s representatives in the previous 2018 general election before they formed the party

    Zuraida also said that the party needs to be part of a political coalition for GE15 to be part of the federal government again

    Ronaldo started last week against Real Sociedad and disappointed in a 1-0 home defeat

    With United’s game at Leeds cancelled, Ronaldo could be back on the bench on Thursday night against Sheriff Tiraspol

    United do not have to rotate, and it is likely Erik ten Hag will pick his strongest possible side, which does not currently include Cristiano Ronaldo

  • PREPARE EARLY FOR FLOODS, SAYS PM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/13/prepare-early-for-floods-says-pm

    09/13/2022, 07:04

    76.0% Shortened!

    “District disaster management committees (JPBD), chaired by the district officer, are to be immediately activated

    “The JPBD has an important function to carry out rescue work and aid delivery at disaster locations while the National Disaster Management Agency (Nadma) and the state disaster management committees (JPBN) will coordinate at central and state levels respectively,” said Ismail Sabri in a statement yesterday

    Earlier, he chaired the central disaster management committee meeting which was attended by the Chief Secretary to the Government, Chief Ministers and Mentris Besar, the Public Service director-general, state government secretaries as well as government agencies

    “The state and district level disaster management committees need to prepare in advance to ensure that aid supplies reach all locations early, before roads are cut off and so on during the actual disaster,” said Ismail Sabri

    Ismail Sabri added that the state and district disaster management committees must ensure that the early warning systems were working well

    To improve the preparedness, Ismail Sabri said 155 community-based disaster risk management programmes involving 12,534 participants had been held.

    ['state', 'government', 'disaster', 'management', 'district']

    “District disaster management committees (JPBD), chaired by the district officer, are to be immediately activated

    “The JPBD has an important function to carry out rescue work and aid delivery at disaster locations while the National Disaster Management Agency (Nadma) and the state disaster management committees (JPBN) will coordinate at central and state levels respectively,” said Ismail Sabri in a statement yesterday

    Earlier, he chaired the central disaster management committee meeting which was attended by the Chief Secretary to the Government, Chief Ministers and Mentris Besar, the Public Service director-general, state government secretaries as well as government agencies

    “The state and district level disaster management committees need to prepare in advance to ensure that aid supplies reach all locations early, before roads are cut off and so on during the actual disaster,” said Ismail Sabri

    Ismail Sabri added that the state and district disaster management committees must ensure that the early warning systems were working well

    To improve the preparedness, Ismail Sabri said 155 community-based disaster risk management programmes involving 12,534 participants had been held.

    ['state', 'government', 'disaster', 'management', 'district']

  • MP SPEAKS | NEW SUHAKAM CHAIR'S ICERD CLARIFICATION A RELIEF

    https://www.malaysiakini.com/columns/635554

    09/13/2022, 07:04

    72.73% Shortened!

    Hadi had said it was compulsory for Muslims to oppose Icerd

    Hadi, who is vice-president of the International Union of Muslim Scholars, seemed unaware that out of the 57-member Organisation of Islamic Conference, only Malaysia and Brunei, which constitute only one percent of the 1.9 billion Muslims in the world, have not ratified Icerd

    DAP made scapegoat, again I was in China on a visit when the Icerd fiasco first blew up at the end of 2018

    Yet, it was the DAP that was accused of being the anti-Malay, anti-Islam and anti-royalty “dark forces” pushing for the ratification of Icerd

    This is one of the bitter lessons of the 22-month Harapan government – the toxic politics of lies, hatred, race, and religion, so deftly mobilised during the Icerd fiasco

    The least Rahmat can do now as new the Suhakam chairperson is to redeem himself and Suhakam by taking steps for Malaysia to recover from the lessons of the Icerd and Rome Statute fiascos in 2018 and 2019

    ['icerd', 'rome', 'statute', 'say', 'malaysia']

    09/13/2022

    62.5% Shortened!

    Liverpool will not play again in the Premier League until October 1, with their trip to Stamford Bridge to play Chelsea now postponed due to the Queen’s funeral

    But with the Queen’s state funeral now to be held in the city on the following day, Monday, September 19, the decision has been made to postpone to a later date

    A Premier League statement has confirmed that two games – Chelsea vs

    Leeds – are postponed due to a lack of police availability

    For the matches being played during the period of National Mourning, tributes will be paid to The Queen at Premier League stadiums

    With a second consecutive Premier League fixture now postponed and the international break immediately after, Liverpool will not play another league game until next month

    ['liverpool', 'premier', 'league', 'postpone', 'due']

    AN old folks home in Taiwan drew flak after hiring a scantily clad woman to dance for its elderly residents to mark the Mid-Autumn Festival, reported Sin Chew Daily

    The old folks home in Taipei confirmed that the event took place on Sept 7 and has since apologised to the public

    However, a family member of one of the residents told the press that the old folks had looked forward to the event, especially since there had been no Mid-Autumn Festival celebration for the past two years due to Covid-19

    Liverpool could look to sell up to five players next summer as they plan their summer re-build

    This summer saw an era come to an end with Sadio Mane leaving for Bayern Munich and that could be the start of another upheaval for next year

    Out of those players, all but Gomez are out of contract next summer and it remains likely that they will all depart

    Bellingham is the long-term target and after missing out on Aurelien Tchouameni this summer, Klopp will want to secure his man this time around

    Bellingham will have the last word, but we won’t see any movement on that until the end of this season

    What we know for sure is that we will see players depart next summer and the midfield has to see some changes if Liverpool want to be successful again.

  • DNA TEST CONFIRMS IDENTITY OF MALAYSIAN WORK SCAM VICTIM IN THAILAND

    09/12/2022, 23:04

    72.73% Shortened!

    Goi Chee Kong and his wife from Ipoh, Perak when met in Bangkok.

    The result of the DNA test showed that Goi Chee Kong is (99.99%) the biological father of the victim

    Teruntum assemblyman Sim Chon Siang, who assisted Chee Kong in Bangkok, said with the results of the DNA test, the family would apply to change the deceased’s name back to his original name - Zhen Feng

    Bernama on Sept 4 reported Chee Kong, 50, and his 45-year-old wife went to Bangkok to search for their missing eldest son

    It was even sadder when they found out that their son was a victim of a job fraud syndicate in Myawaddy, Myanmar

    On Feb 7, Zhen Feng’s father made a missing person report

  • ISMAIL SABRI: HEALTH MINISTRY DIRECTED TO GIVE BEST CARE TO NAJIB

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/12/ismail-sabri-health-ministry-directed-to-give-best-care-to-najib

    09/12/2022, 21:04

    65.0% Shortened!

    Monday, 12 Sep 2022

    “I have been informed about Datuk Seri Najib Razak’s health condition

    “I have instructed the Health Ministry to provide the best care he needs

    I wish him good health,” said the Prime Minister in a tweet on Monday (Sept 12)

    He said the former premier was admitted to HKL on Friday (Sept 9) for an elective or non-emergency case to ensure his health was at an optimum level

    "The Health Ministry is committed and transparent in providing health services to individuals

    ['health', 'ministry', 'former', 'najib', 'say']

    09/12/2022, 20:04

    71.43% Shortened!

    Finance Minister Tengku Datuk Seri Zafrul Tengku Abdul Aziz said Malaysia is likely to chart even stronger growth in the third quarter despite facing a weaker global economy as well as the rising US dollar

    "Obviously, there are side effects from an increasing interest rate to the economy

    On the ringgit, Tengku Zafrul stressed that the government would not be too fixated on the performance of the currency as it continues to focus on the mid-to-long term performance of the economy

    "You have to understand the inflation rate in the US

    The monetary tools that are available in Malaysia or other markets depend on the economic scenario of the particular country

    "The inflation rate in Malaysia in the first six to seven months (of 2022) is 2.8 per cent, so we could have an accommodative economic policy, (with) very large fiscal support,” he added

    ['malaysia', 'economic', 'growth', 'per', 'cent']

  • SELANGOR SULTAN BACKS AGONG'S REMINDER AGAINST ABUSING ROYAL PARDON

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/12/selangor-sultan-backs-agongs-reminder-against-abusing-royal-pardon/27817

    09/12/2022, 16:04

    45.45% Shortened!

    The Selangor monarch reminded Malaysians that while the King has the discretionary power to pardon those that have been convicted, it must be done according to the law

    "I would like to convey my solid support for the decree by the Yang di-Pertuan Agong on September 5, 2022 with regards to the prerogative power to pardon that cannot be meted out arbitrarily for the sake of vested interests

    In his speech while officiating the Pahang Shariah Court Complex in Kuantan, Pahang on September 5, Yang di-Pertuan Agong Sultan Abdullah Sultan Ahmad Shah was reported to have said that the power to punish and pardon must not be used arbitrarily because it will be held accountable in the "afterlife”

    "If the law is not implemented consistently and fairly, justice will certainly not be achieved as the philosophy behind the enactment of a law would have been tainted, and as a result, the disadvantaged party would end up being victimised by those in power,” national news agency Bernama had quoted the Agong as saying

    Inversely, a campaign was launched to petition the Agong against granting the pardon

    A royal pardon falls under Article 42(1) of the Federal Constitution, which gives the Agong or Sultan the powers to grant a pardon or reprieve to a convict.

    ['sultan', 'agong', 'pardon', 'power', 'law']

    The Selangor monarch reminded Malaysians that while the King has the discretionary power to pardon those that have been convicted, it must be done according to the law

    "I would like to convey my solid support for the decree by the Yang di-Pertuan Agong on September 5, 2022 with regards to the prerogative power to pardon that cannot be meted out arbitrarily for the sake of vested interests

    "If the law is not implemented consistently and fairly, justice will certainly not be achieved as the philosophy behind the enactment of a law would have been tainted, and as a result, the disadvantaged party would end up being victimised by those in power,” national news agency Bernama had quoted the Agong as saying

    Inversely, a campaign was launched to petition the Agong against granting the pardon

    A royal pardon falls under Article 42(1) of the Federal Constitution, which gives the Agong or Sultan the powers to grant a pardon or reprieve to a convict.

  • RESTRUCTURING PARLIAMENT BETTER THAN GIVING BORNEO MALAYSIA 35PC SEATS, CLAIMS SARAWAK ACTIVIST

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/12/restructuring-parliament-better-than-giving-borneo-malaysia-35pc-seats-claims-sarawak-activist/27814

    09/12/2022, 15:04

    57.14% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUCHING, Sept 12 — A Sarawak rights advocate today called for a restructuring of Parliament to better provide constitutional protection for Borneo Malaysia under the Malaysia Agreement 1963

    Peter John Jaban said the restructuring would be more effective compared to allocating 35 per cent of seats in Dewan Rakyat to Sarawak and Sabah

    “It is against the principle of democracy for the Special Council on Malaysia Agreement 1963 (MA63) to agree to allocate 35 per cent of the parliamentary seats to the two territories that have a combined 20 per cent of the country’s total population,” he said in a statement

    He also said Sabah and Sarawak should also not be allowed a disproportionate influence in a properly functioning democracy

    The endorsement would enable Sabah and Sarawak to have 78 of the 222 seats in the Dewan Rakyat

    Abang Johari, responding to Ongkili’s statement, had asserted that the insistence to have a one-third or 35 per cent of the combined number of seats in Parliament for Sarawak and Sabah was to safeguard their interest against any power-crazy federal leaders.

    ['sarawak', 'constitutional', 'say', 'per', 'cent']

    About Us Advertise KUCHING, Sept 12 — A Sarawak rights advocate today called for a restructuring of Parliament to better provide constitutional protection for Borneo Malaysia under the Malaysia Agreement 1963

    Peter John Jaban said the restructuring would be more effective compared to allocating 35 per cent of seats in Dewan Rakyat to Sarawak and Sabah

    “It is against the principle of democracy for the Special Council on Malaysia Agreement 1963 (MA63) to agree to allocate 35 per cent of the parliamentary seats to the two territories that have a combined 20 per cent of the country’s total population,” he said in a statement

    He also said Sabah and Sarawak should also not be allowed a disproportionate influence in a properly functioning democracy

    The endorsement would enable Sabah and Sarawak to have 78 of the 222 seats in the Dewan Rakyat

    Abang Johari, responding to Ongkili’s statement, had asserted that the insistence to have a one-third or 35 per cent of the combined number of seats in Parliament for Sarawak and Sabah was to safeguard their interest against any power-crazy federal leaders.

    ['sarawak', 'constitutional', 'say', 'per', 'cent']

  • MAYBANK HQ TO RELOCATE TO MENARA MERDEKA 118 IN 1Q 2025

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/09/12/maybank-hq-to-relocate-to-menara-merdeka-118

    09/12/2022, 14:03

    76.92% Shortened!

    He added that all existing offices within Menara Maybank will relocate to the new building on a staggered basis starting from the first quarter of 2025

    The KL Main Branch in Menara Maybank, however, will remain and there will be no impact to customers who have accounts in this branch

    "Since Maybank is not in the business of property development, the bank saw it prudent to pursue the tenancy option while evaluating the best options for its current head office, Menara Maybank, which it owns and will become largely vacant with the move to Menara Merdeka 118

    "As a result, both parties have entered into a lease agreement for a period of 10 years on a triple net basis for Menara Maybank, concurrently with the tenancy agreement for Menara Merdeka 118," he added

    Selected Maybank subsidiaries currently based in Dataran Maybank will also be relocated to Menara Merdeka 118 including Maybank Islamic, Maybank Investment Bank and Maybank Asset Management

    “The leasing of Menara Maybank is a win-win solution for both parties

    Five minutes later, the RMAF crew went down to the location and found the victim in the cockpit

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/true-or-not/2022/09/12/quickcheck-is-it-true-that-a-child-was-kidnapped-from-a-tuition-centre-in-jb

    09/12/2022, 12:04

    45.45% Shortened!

    A VIRAL message has been making its rounds on WhatsApp and social media claiming that there was a boy kidnapped from a tuition centre in Johor Baru

    In a statement on Saturday (Sept 10), Johor police chief Datuk Kamarul Zaman Mamat said that further investigations found that the nine-year-old boy was at home with his father

    "Spreading this kind of message is seen as an attempt to create fear and anxiety among the public

    "The act of spreading fake news is illegal and action can be taken under Section 233 of the Communications and Multimedia Act 1998, which provides for a fine of not more than RM50,000 or imprisonment not exceeding one year if convicted," he added

    Report it to us

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['viral', 'message', 'johor', 'say', 'report']

    He named Lokman as the sole defendant in the suit

    In the statement of claim, Ismail Sabri, 62, stated that Lokman had on Aug 22 made defamatory statements against him in a video, with the title "Bila Presiden UMNO Panggil Tak Datang! Tapi PM Ada Masa Jumpa Mahathir - Lokman Adam” (When Called by UMNO President, He Doesn't Come! But the PM Has Time to See Mahathir - Lokman Adam)

    He claimed the malicious, defamatory and untrue statements were uploaded on four social media accounts belonging to the defendant, namely "Lokman Adam" Youtube, "Lokman Noor Adam Official" Facebook, "lokmanooradam" Instagram and "datoklokmanadam" Tik Tok

    On Sept 1, Lokman pleaded not guilty in the Sessions Court here to two charges of making and initiating offensive communications against Ismail Sabri and the government through a Facebook application under the profile name "Lokman Noor Adam Official"

  • SUHAKAM CHAIR CLAIMS MALAYSIA WASN'T READY TO SIGN ROME STATUTE, ICERD IN 2019, BUT HAVE TO START PREPARING

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/12/suhakam-chair-claims-malaysia-wasnt-ready-to-sign-rome-statute-icerd-in-2019-but-have-to-start-preparing/27770

    09/12/2022, 11:04

    72.73% Shortened!

    "People misunderstood me, [they think] that I am an opposer of the Rome Statute

    In the interview with the news portal, Rahmat said that while the government of the day's intentions were good, the country was just not ready to sign the treaty at that point

    "If you become party to the Rome Statute, you need to domesticate local laws

    "In our case, we have to go to Parliament to do the necessary laws to ensure the provisions in the Rome Statute are applicable,” Rahmat told Malaysiakini

    Another international treaty that the PH government sought to ratify and failed was the International Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Racial Discrimination (ICERD)

    In 2018, he penned an open letter highlighting that Malaysia should prioritise legislating international human rights instruments into domestic law before ratifying international human rights laws

    ['malaysia', 'rahmat', 'rome', 'statute', 'law']

    "People misunderstood me, [they think] that I am an opposer of the Rome Statute

    In the interview with the news portal, Rahmat said that while the government of the day's intentions were good, the country was just not ready to sign the treaty at that point

    "If you become party to the Rome Statute, you need to domesticate local laws

    "In our case, we have to go to Parliament to do the necessary laws to ensure the provisions in the Rome Statute are applicable,” Rahmat told Malaysiakini

    Another international treaty that the PH government sought to ratify and failed was the International Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Racial Discrimination (ICERD)

    In 2018, he penned an open letter highlighting that Malaysia should prioritise legislating international human rights instruments into domestic law before ratifying international human rights laws

    ['malaysia', 'rahmat', 'rome', 'statute', 'law']

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/12/pm-ismail-sabri-obtains-court-order-for-lokman-adam-to-take-down-offensive-social-media-posts/27768

    09/12/2022, 10:23

    60.0% Shortened!

    “The court issued an injunction to compel the defendant to remove a video, with the title Bila Presiden Umno Panggil Tak Datang! Tapi PM Ada Masa Jumpa Mahathir - Lokman Adam which was uploaded on the defendant’s YouTube, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok accounts

    Ismail Sabri, 62, applied for the injunction in a suit he filed against Lokman, 49, last Sept 8

    The prime minister, who is Umno vice-president, filed the suit in his personal capacity

    He named Lokman as the sole defendant in the suit

    In the statement of claim, Ismail Sabri, 62, stated that Lokman had on Aug 22 made defamatory statements against him in a video, with the title Bila Presiden Umno Panggil Tak Datang! Tapi PM Ada Masa Jumpa Mahathir - Lokman Adam (When Called by Umno President, He Doesn’t Come! But the PM Has Time to See Mahathir - Lokman Adam)

    Last Sept 1, Lokman pleaded not guilty in the Sessions Court here to two charges of making and initiating offensive communications against Ismail Sabri and the government through a Facebook application under the profile name “Lokman Noor Adam Official”

    ['ismail', 'sabri', 'lokman', 'adam', 'umno']

    The site was detected at 8.20am near Bidor

    "We would like to thank the police, the Air Force and the Fire and Rescue Department for their quick support and assistance in making this search and rescue operation successful," Dr Wee said in his Facebook post

    On Sunday, the helicopter, with a single pilot on board, is said to have lost contact with KLATCC at 12.16pm

  • EX-PM PAK LAH FIGHTS DEMENTIA | THE STAR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/12/ex-pm-pak-lah-fights-dementia

    09/12/2022, 08:04

    68.42% Shortened!

    “He doesn’t remember my name or even my wife’s name

    The only reason I know that he recognises me is because there is a flicker in his eyes when I come to visit him,” said Khairy of the former prime minister who is his father-in-law

    “Dementia is a very, very cruel condition because the body is there but the mind isn’t.” Khairy shared that the family decided to be open about it to shine a light on dementia and cognitive impairment

    “I see how my mother-in-law struggles,” said Khairy, adding that his father-in-law is wheelchair-bound

    He acknowledged that the family was fortunate to get professional caregivers “as those with deteriorating dementia need constant round-the-clock care for their own safety”

    He also said that the government is set to invest more in public social care to support underprivileged families with dementia patients

    ['family', 'dementia', 'say', 'khairy', 'law']

  • QUEEN ELIZABETH'S LEGACY LIVES ON IN SABAH

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/12/queen-elizabeths-legacy-lives-on-in-sabah

    09/12/2022, 08:04

    64.71% Shortened!

    A healthcare facility near the city, the Queen Elizabeth Hospital, is among the contributions or legacies left behind by the British before the formation of the Federation of Malaysia in 1963

    When it first opened in 1957, this hospital was just a single wooden building

    The Queen had previously visited Sabah and the hospital with her husband, Prince Philip, and their daughter, Princess Anne, in 1972

    Assoc Prof Dr Bilcher Bala, who teaches history at Universiti Malaysia Sabah’s (UMS) Faculty of Social Sciences and Humanities, said that the hospital was named after Queen Elizabeth II

    “I think the reason why Sabah has among the most landmarks or buildings named after the royal family was because of the relations between the British and Sabah, which was previously known as North Borneo,” he said

    Queen Elizabeth II, the longest-serving monarch (70-year reign) in British history, died peacefully in Scotland on Sept 8.

    ['queen', 'elizabeth', 'hospital', 'sabah', 'british']

    A healthcare facility near the city, the Queen Elizabeth Hospital, is among the contributions or legacies left behind by the British before the formation of the Federation of Malaysia in 1963

    When it first opened in 1957, this hospital was just a single wooden building

    The Queen had previously visited Sabah and the hospital with her husband, Prince Philip, and their daughter, Princess Anne, in 1972

    Assoc Prof Dr Bilcher Bala, who teaches history at Universiti Malaysia Sabah’s (UMS) Faculty of Social Sciences and Humanities, said that the hospital was named after Queen Elizabeth II

    “I think the reason why Sabah has among the most landmarks or buildings named after the royal family was because of the relations between the British and Sabah, which was previously known as North Borneo,” he said

    Queen Elizabeth II, the longest-serving monarch (70-year reign) in British history, died peacefully in Scotland on Sept 8.

    ['queen', 'elizabeth', 'hospital', 'sabah', 'british']

    He acknowledged that the family was fortunate to get professional caregivers “as those with deteriorating dementia need constant round-the-clock care for their own safety”

  • CROWD HELPED FNATIC WIN THIS ROUND AT VALORANT CHAMPIONS

    https://www.oneesports.gg/valorant/fnatic-crowd-valorant-champions-boaster/

    09/12/2022

    75.0% Shortened!

    Fnatic emerged triumphant in their first lower bracket match, eliminating regional rivals Team Liquid 2-0 convincingly at Valorant Champions 2022

    As one of the best teams on Bind with their double controller agent picks Viper and Brimstone, Fnatic took a quick 3-0 lead over Team Liquid

    This left Elias “Jamppi” Olkkonen as the last man standing for Team Liquid

    After the match, Boaster broke down the round and explained how the crowd made him realize he missed his Brimstone molly

    It got confirmed by the noise from the crowd and I had to swing.” Boaster explained further and said that he was going to swing anyway because of his intuition that Team Liquid could be sticking the defuse

    The Round 4 win gave Fnatic a significant economical advantage, along with more momentum which they used to string together an 8-0 round win streak on Bind

    ['crowd', 'fnatic', 'match', 'team', 'liquid']

  • FIRMS WITH NET CASH TO GAIN FROM OPR HIKE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/09/12/firms-with-net-cash-to-gain-from-opr-hike

    09/12/2022, 07:04

    58.82% Shortened!

    The research house noted that the OPR hike could negatively impact investor sentiment in the short term but will not have a too negative impact on corporates

    The current OPR rate of 2.5% is still below the pre-Covid level of 3%, leading CGS-CIMB to forecast the central bank to raise the OPR by another 50 bps (via two 25-bps hikes) next year

    The rate hike is also negative for companies with high floating-rate ringgit borrowings, due to higher interest expense

    “Our analysis shows the OPR hike having the largest positive impact on Bank Islam Malaysia Bhd (7.6% increase in financial year 2023 or FY23 net profit for every 25-bps hike) as its forecast floating-rate loan ratio of 91% in FY23 is the sector’s highest

    “Conversely, the impact would be the smallest on Affin Bank Bhd’s forecast FY23 net profit (0.2% increase for every 25-bps hike) as its forecast FY23 floating-rate loan ratio of 74.1% is one of the lowest in the sector,” CGS-CIMB noted

    It added that if it were to factor in the OPR hike projected in 2023, every additional 25-bps hike would increase its net profit forecasts for banks by an estimated 2.1% (on a full-year basis; for FY24 for Hong Leong Bank Bhd, AMMB Holdings Bhd and Alliance Bank Malaysia Bhd, and FY23 for the rest)

    “The positive impact from the OPR hike could be partly diluted by higher cost of funds from a pick-up in deposit competition,” it said.

    ['bank', 'rate', 'opr', 'bps', 'net']

    The research house noted that the OPR hike could negatively impact investor sentiment in the short term but will not have a too negative impact on corporates

    The current OPR rate of 2.5% is still below the pre-Covid level of 3%, leading CGS-CIMB to forecast the central bank to raise the OPR by another 50 bps (via two 25-bps hikes) next year

    The rate hike is also negative for companies with high floating-rate ringgit borrowings, due to higher interest expense

    “Our analysis shows the OPR hike having the largest positive impact on Bank Islam Malaysia Bhd (7.6% increase in financial year 2023 or FY23 net profit for every 25-bps hike) as its forecast floating-rate loan ratio of 91% in FY23 is the sector’s highest

    “Conversely, the impact would be the smallest on Affin Bank Bhd’s forecast FY23 net profit (0.2% increase for every 25-bps hike) as its forecast FY23 floating-rate loan ratio of 74.1% is one of the lowest in the sector,” CGS-CIMB noted

    It added that if it were to factor in the OPR hike projected in 2023, every additional 25-bps hike would increase its net profit forecasts for banks by an estimated 2.1% (on a full-year basis; for FY24 for Hong Leong Bank Bhd, AMMB Holdings Bhd and Alliance Bank Malaysia Bhd, and FY23 for the rest)

    “The positive impact from the OPR hike could be partly diluted by higher cost of funds from a pick-up in deposit competition,” it said.

    ['bank', 'rate', 'opr', 'bps', 'net']

  • MAYBANK HQ TO RELOCATE TO MENARA MERDEKA 118 IN 1Q25

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2022/09/12/maybank-hq-to-relocate-to-menara-merdeka-118

    09/12/2022

    75.0% Shortened!

    He added that all existing offices within Menara Maybank will relocate to the new building on a staggered basis starting from the first quarter of 2025

    The KL Main Branch in Menara Maybank, however, will remain and there will be no impact to customers who have accounts in this branch

    "Since Maybank is not in the business of property development, the bank saw it prudent to pursue the tenancy option while evaluating the best options for its current head office, Menara Maybank, which it owns and will become largely vacant with the move to Menara Merdeka 118

    "As a result, both parties have entered into a lease agreement for a period of 10 years on a triple net basis for Menara Maybank, concurrently with the tenancy agreement for Menara Merdeka 118," he added

    Selected Maybank subsidiaries currently based in Dataran Maybank will also be relocated to Menara Merdeka 118 including Maybank Islamic, Maybank Investment Bank and Maybank Asset Management

    “The leasing of Menara Maybank is a win-win solution for both parties

  • PM ISMAIL SABRI OBTAINS COURT ORDER FOR LOKMAN ADAM TO TAKE DOWN OFFENSIVE SOCIAL MEDIA POSTS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/12/pm-ismail-sabri-obtains-court-order-for-lokman-adam-to-take-down-offensive-social-media-posts/27768

    09/12/2022

    60.0% Shortened!

    “The court issued an injunction to compel the defendant to remove a video, with the title Bila Presiden Umno Panggil Tak Datang! Tapi PM Ada Masa Jumpa Mahathir - Lokman Adam which was uploaded on the defendant’s YouTube, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok accounts

    Ismail Sabri, 62, applied for the injunction in a suit he filed against Lokman, 49, last Sept 8

    The prime minister, who is Umno vice-president, filed the suit in his personal capacity

    He named Lokman as the sole defendant in the suit

    In the statement of claim, Ismail Sabri, 62, stated that Lokman had on Aug 22 made defamatory statements against him in a video, with the title Bila Presiden Umno Panggil Tak Datang! Tapi PM Ada Masa Jumpa Mahathir - Lokman Adam (When Called by Umno President, He Doesn’t Come! But the PM Has Time to See Mahathir - Lokman Adam)

    Last Sept 1, Lokman pleaded not guilty in the Sessions Court here to two charges of making and initiating offensive communications against Ismail Sabri and the government through a Facebook application under the profile name “Lokman Noor Adam Official”

    ['ismail', 'sabri', 'lokman', 'adam', 'umno']

    The 50-year-old is on the lookout for a new role after Cincinnati sacked him in September last year, but there was no call from Old Trafford chiefs after he offered himself to United

    "I've never spoken to United - nobody phoned me about anything," Stam told bet365

    "But, like I said before, United is a club that I love

    I made history with that club, which is very positive, so if they need me, or if I can help them out in anyway, I'm always willing to do so."     Manchester United news, exclusives and analysis That’s according to former Chelsea and Tottenham ace Gus Poyet, who believes the winger will pay the price for staying at Old Trafford

    However, Pellistri has been starved off first-team opportunities as the club felt he was not ready to make the step-up to Premier League football

    The winger had been set to go out on loan again this season but he remained at Old Trafford and he’s yet to make a single appearance

    Pellistri is hoping to form part of Uruguay’s World Cup squad in November but his lack of football threatens his chances

    ‘He needs to find a place to play, like Luis Suarez who is playing at Nacional week in week out, training with the first team and getting game time three months before the World Cup, Pellistri should do something similar.’

    Compared to previous editions where Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo often touched 93 or 94, the highest rating this time is capped at 91

    That honour has gone to five players, including (now) Barcelona’s very own Robert Lewandowski and Messi

    Benzema, however, probably takes home the mantle for the best player, winning the league and UCL, while scoring 44 goals

    Messi, meanwhile, did not have the best of seasons, but FIFA ratings are also ranked on history and ability, so a 91 is the bare minimum he deserves

    Mbappe is the official poster boy for the game, and had a pretty solid season himself with 39 goals

    While his displays probably don’t touch the rest of the three, we can definitely see why he shares the same podium

  • INDONESIA LEAVING AUSTRALIA IN ITS EV-MAKING DUST

    https://asiatimes.com/2022/09/indonesia-leaving-australia-in-its-ev-making-dust/

    09/12/2022

    85.42% Shortened!

    What critics ignored at the time was Indonesia’s massive reserves of nickel, mostly on the islands of Sulawesi and Maluku, and the greater value to be gained from initially processing the mineral into nickel pig iron and from there into stainless steel and nickel alloy steel

    In Indonesia, the opposite has been the case

    “Indonesia is the undisputed king of the nickel world,” independent Australian consultant Steven Brown told last month’s Nickel Summit 2022 in Jakarta

    But experts say, ultimately, nickel demand continues to grow and that won’t change for some time

    Indonesia is already the world’s largest nickel-producing country, supplying more than 950,000 tonnes in 2021, or 35% of global production

    Jakarta is now considering a progressive tax on nickel exports, beginning with a 2% duty on ferronickel and nickel pig iron – or products with less than 70% nickel – to encourage further downstream investments

    “Without Indonesia nickel, there will be no energy transition,” says Brown, noting the “tremendous” benefits it is bringing to the country and the fact that before 2009 Indonesia had only two operating nickel plants

    ['indonesia', 'australia', 'battery', 'world', 'nickel']

    What critics ignored at the time was Indonesia’s massive reserves of nickel, mostly on the islands of Sulawesi and Maluku, and the greater value to be gained from initially processing the mineral into nickel pig iron and from there into stainless steel and nickel alloy steel

    In Indonesia, the opposite has been the case

    “Indonesia is the undisputed king of the nickel world,” independent Australian consultant Steven Brown told last month’s Nickel Summit 2022 in Jakarta

    But experts say, ultimately, nickel demand continues to grow and that won’t change for some time

    Indonesia is already the world’s largest nickel-producing country, supplying more than 950,000 tonnes in 2021, or 35% of global production

    Jakarta is now considering a progressive tax on nickel exports, beginning with a 2% duty on ferronickel and nickel pig iron – or products with less than 70% nickel – to encourage further downstream investments

    “Without Indonesia nickel, there will be no energy transition,” says Brown, noting the “tremendous” benefits it is bringing to the country and the fact that before 2009 Indonesia had only two operating nickel plants

    ['indonesia', 'australia', 'battery', 'world', 'nickel']



  • MAYBANK TO MOVE HQ TO MERDEKA 118 IN 2025, CONFIRMS THE EDGE'S REPORT

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/article/maybank-move-hq-merdeka-118-2025-confirms-edges-report

    09/12/2022

    68.42% Shortened!

    In regards to the existing Menara Maybank, the group has entered into a 10-year lease agreement with PNB to lease the property to PNB on a triple net basis, meaning all expenses of Menara Maybank, including maintenance, insurance, and all taxes will be borne by PNB

    PNB may rent out Menara Maybank to sub-tenants

    “Should Menara Maybank be sold to a buyer secured by PNB within the term of the lease agreement or a period of up to 24 months after the expiry of the term of the lease agreement, at a price agreed by Maybank, the net proceeds will be shared between Maybank and PNB, in line with market practice,” said Maybank in a Bursa Malaysia filing

    “For the avoidance of doubt, Maybank itself may also secure a buyer for Menara Maybank,” it added

    Also relocating to Menara Merdeka 118 are selected Maybank subsidiaries currently based in Dataran Maybank, including Maybank Islamic, Maybank Investment Bank and Maybank Asset Management

    Maybank to move its HQ to Merdeka 118, sources say

    ['menara', 'merdeka', 'maybank', 'bank', 'pnb']

  • 2023 TOYOTA INNOVA ZENIX - NEXT GEN MPV SWITCHES FROM IMV PLATFORM TO TNGA, TO DEBUT IN NOV 22? - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2022/09/11/toyota-innova-zenix-2023-tnga/

    09/11/2022

    66.67% Shortened!

    There are some rumours coming out of Indonesia that we are due to see a next generation Toyota Innova launched there as early as November 2022, which is 2 months from now, and it might be called the Toyota Innova Zenix

    What is called the Toyota Innova in the Malaysian market is called the Toyota Kijang Innova in Indonesia

    There is a top of the line variant there called the Toyota Kijang Innova Venturer, so the word Zenix might be some form of top of the line variant suffix

    Alternatively, the name of the car could be renamed to Innova Zenix or simply Zenix, just like how the Avanza Veloz eventually became just the Toyota Veloz with the latest generation

    Essentially, the new Toyota Innova Zenix will end up being a three-row MPV version of the Toyota Corolla Cross

    The Veloz sits below the Kijang Innova, priced from Rp 286,000,000 for the manual up to Rp 331,100,000 for the Veloz Q CVT with Toyota Safety Sense

    ['car', 'toyota', 'innova', 'zenix', 'veloz']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 11 — PKR president Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim today said that it is not right to conclude that change will happen only with young leaders

    and the process must be democratic

    “People suggest, maybe Nurul Izzah, maybe Rafizi, but can you build a consensus and compromise first in the party?” he added, referencing his daughter and PKR vice-president Nurul Izzah Anwar, as well as deputy president Rafizi Ramii

    To note, in the PKR party elections held in April this year, Anwar won the presidency uncontested

    Anwar added that many of PKR’s state leaders, and previous deputy ministers during Pakatan Harapan’s (PH) time in government, were from the younger “second generation” of party members

    One of the students also asked if Anwar had the courage to step down from leadership in his party, if there was a younger leader who had “potential”

    09/11/2022, 15:04

    77.78% Shortened!

    On Sunday at 0900 GMT, Elizabeth's oak coffin, which has been in the ballroom of Balmoral Castle covered with the royal standard of Scotland and with a wreath of flowers on top, will be placed in a hearse by six gamekeepers

    "I know how deeply you, the entire nation - and I think I may say the whole world - sympathise with me in the irreparable loss we have all suffered," her son King Charles said at a ceremony on Saturday where he was officially proclaimed the new monarch

    "We all thought she was invincible," her grandson Prince William, now the heir to the throne, told a well-wisher on Saturday as he met crowds at Windsor castle

    FUNERAL Elizabeth's state funeral will be held at London's Westminster Abbey on Monday, Sept

    Truss, whose appointment as prime minister on Tuesday was the queen's last public act, will join King Charles as both the new head of state and prime minister tour the four nations of the United Kingdom in the next few days

    Elizabeth's death has capped a difficult couple of years for the royal family which has seen the loss of Prince Philip, its patriarch, her second son Prince Andrew accused of sex abuse - which he denied - and grandson Prince Harry and his wife Meghan step down from royal life to move to California

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Sept 11 — Former prime minister Tun Abdullah Ahmad Badawi suffers from dementia, his son-in-law Khairy Jamaluddin revealed today

    “Pak Lah suffers from dementia

    The family has decided to openly share this partly to shine a light on dementia and cognitive impairment,” said Khairy in a tweet

    Pak Lah suffers from dementia.It has been challenging for us to see the deterioration in his cognitive function

    The family has decided to openly share this partly to shine a light on dementia & cognitive impairment

    In addition, Khairy said the Health Ministry together with the Women, Family and Community Development Ministry are discussing how they can increase provisions for community healthcare so they can help families who need a nurse to take care of a family member with dementia.

  • PM ISMAIL SABRI YET TO DISCUSS GE15 DATE WITH UMNO’S TOP FIVE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2022/09/11/pm-ismail-sabri-yet-to-discuss-ge15-date-with-umnos-top-five/27666

    09/11/2022, 14:04

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise BERA, Sept 11 — Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob today said that he has yet to discuss with Umno’s top five the date for the 15th General Election (GE15)

    Umno’s top five refers to its president Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi, deputy president Datuk Seri Mohamad Hasan and the three vice-presidents, Datuk Seri Mohamed Khaled Nordin, Datuk Seri Mahdzir Khalid and Ismail Sabri himself

    “That’s the procedure that needs to be observed,” he said in his speech at the presentation of the 2022 allocation for the Chinese and Indian communities in the Bera parliamentary constituency at Bera Umno Complex in Padang Luas here today

    However, Ismail Sabri told BN leaders in the Bera parliamentary constituency to be ready with their election machinery and to meet with the voters to maintain the coalition’s victory in Bera and the Guai and Kemayan state seats, and recapture the Triang state seat

    Ismail Sabri said in Bera, the BN machinery should work hard not only to maintain the parliamentary and the Guai and Kemayan state seats, but also to win back the Triang state seat from DAP

    “Now, the Triang seat is given to MCA and MCA has to prove that they can win the seat

    ['bera', 'datuk', 'seri', 'say', 'umno']

  • QUEEN'S COFFIN HEADS TO SCOTTISH PALACE, HISTORIC CHURCH

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2022/09/11/queens-coffin-heads-to-scottish-palace-historic-church/27647

    09/11/2022, 12:04

    66.67% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise EDINBURGH, Sept 11 — The Palace of Holyroodhouse and St Giles' Cathedral in Edinburgh, where Queen Elizabeth II's coffin will rest in the coming days, are both steeped in royal history — and anti-English sentiment

    In 1633, Holyroodhouse was the site of the Scottish coronation of King Charles I, whose reign led to a civil war in which he was executed, and the palace was damaged and abandoned

    After a brief republic, his son returned as King Charles II in 1660 and renovated the palace

    Protestant rootsOn Monday, the new king will accompany his mother's coffin in procession along the Royal Mile to the magnificent St Giles' Cathedral, where he will also hold a vigil

    St Giles' also houses the Thistle Chapel, home to Scotland's highest chivalric order, the Order of the Thistle

    Elizabeth, as head of the order, was present when Charles was installed as a member in 1977

    ['edinburgh', 'palace', 'holyroodhouse', 'giles', 'queen']

    About Us Advertise EDINBURGH, Sept 11 — The Palace of Holyroodhouse and St Giles' Cathedral in Edinburgh, where Queen Elizabeth II's coffin will rest in the coming days, are both steeped in royal history — and anti-English sentiment

    In 1633, Holyroodhouse was the site of the Scottish coronation of King Charles I, whose reign led to a civil war in which he was executed, and the palace was damaged and abandoned

    After a brief republic, his son returned as King Charles II in 1660 and renovated the palace

    Protestant rootsOn Monday, the new king will accompany his mother's coffin in procession along the Royal Mile to the magnificent St Giles' Cathedral, where he will also hold a vigil

    St Giles' also houses the Thistle Chapel, home to Scotland's highest chivalric order, the Order of the Thistle

    Elizabeth, as head of the order, was present when Charles was installed as a member in 1977

    ['edinburgh', 'palace', 'holyroodhouse', 'giles', 'queen']

    The queen’s coffin is currently at Balmoral Castle, Scotland, where it is draped in the Standard of Scotland

    On Sept 13, the queen’s coffin will be flown from Edinburgh to London, then driven to Buckingham Palace

    On Sept 14, members of the Royal Family, including the king and the queen consort, will attend prayers in Buckingham Palace

    The queen’s coffin will then be taken in procession, including the king and members of the Royal Family, to Westminster Hall

    68.42% Shortened!

    “Prior to the State Funeral, The Queen will Lie-in-State in Westminster Hall for four days, to allow the public to pay their respects,” the statement said

    The queen’s coffin “will travel from Scotland by Royal Air Force aircraft from Edinburgh Airport” to London on Sept 13, it added

    The queen’s coffin is currently at Balmoral Castle, Scotland, where it is draped in the Standard of Scotland

    On Sept 13, the queen’s coffin will be flown from Edinburgh to London, then driven to Buckingham Palace

    The queen’s coffin will then be taken in procession, including the king and members of the Royal Family, to Westminster Hall

    It is at Westminster Hall where the queen will lie in state for four days, until 6.30 am the day of the state funeral, for members of the public to pay their respects

  • MORE MONEY FOR MARA SCHOLARS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/11/more-money-for-mara-scholars

    09/11/2022, 08:04

    75.0% Shortened!

    Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob, has announced that the new living allowance rate for local students has been increased from a minimum of RM650 to a maximum of RM950 per month from diploma to professional and doctoral degree levels

    The living allowance was used towards accommodation, food, transportation, and daily needs, he said

    He said the existing allowance rate had been used for over 13 years and there was a need to review it following the increase in the cost of living in the country over the past 10 years, the coronavirus pandemic and other issues

    This is between 60 and 70% of the allowance received by each student,” he said

    He added that the living allowance for Mara and JPA students, such as in London, was £1,045 or RM5,712, much lower than the UK government’s recommended median of £1,312 or RM7,172 as of September 2021

    When met by reporters after the ceremony, Ismail Sabri said he had instructed the JPA to also review the living allowance rates for JPA-sponsored students.

    ['living', 'allowance', 'student', 'sponsor', 'mara']

    Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob, has announced that the new living allowance rate for local students has been increased from a minimum of RM650 to a maximum of RM950 per month from diploma to professional and doctoral degree levels

    The living allowance was used towards accommodation, food, transportation, and daily needs, he said

    He said the existing allowance rate had been used for over 13 years and there was a need to review it following the increase in the cost of living in the country over the past 10 years, the coronavirus pandemic and other issues

    This is between 60 and 70% of the allowance received by each student,” he said

    He added that the living allowance for Mara and JPA students, such as in London, was £1,045 or RM5,712, much lower than the UK government’s recommended median of £1,312 or RM7,172 as of September 2021

    When met by reporters after the ceremony, Ismail Sabri said he had instructed the JPA to also review the living allowance rates for JPA-sponsored students.

    ['living', 'allowance', 'student', 'sponsor', 'mara']



  • SAYING 'I DO' ON MID-AUTUMN FESTIVAL DAY

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/11/saying-i-do-on-mid-autumn-festival-day

    09/11/2022, 08:04

    73.91% Shortened!

    “Since this is the ninth year we were dating and the Mid-Autumn Festival also falls on the ninth month of the year, which is September, I decided to make our marriage a memorable day,” said Tan, who is from Kulim

    “We also chose to register our wedding on this day because we wanted to get the blessings of our elders on this auspicious day,” he said

    Ooi, who was dressed in a blue cheongsam for the occasion, said her parents had let her and Tan pick a suitable wedding date

    Ooi had also brought along her pet rabbit Bean for the wedding

    Tan and Ooi were among 48 couples who exchanged their marriage vows at the Penang Chinese Town Hall (PCTH) here yesterday in conjunction with the festival

    Present were PCTH chairman Tan Sri Tan Khoon Hai, PCTH women’s section chairman Datuk Ooi Siew Kim, and committee members

    ['day', 'tan', 'festival', 'say', 'ooi']

  • NEW RULES ON CONCERTS SOON | THE STAR

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2022/09/11/new-rules-on-concerts-soon

    09/11/2022, 08:03

    76.92% Shortened!

    It is now being finalised by the committee in the Central Agency for Application for Filming and Performance by Foreign Artistes (Puspal), which is under the ministry

    To better facilitate applications, Mohammad also revealed that a new system is in the works to handle the application process for permits for performances by foreign artistes and filming by foreign film crews

    “The live events industry in Malaysia is recovering, but for this year, the total revenue is only expected to reach 50% of pre-pandemic times

    An example of a successful international music event in Malaysia is the recurring Rainforest World Music Festival in Sarawak

    At its return after two years since the pandemic, over 7,000 tickets were sold, while more watched the live performances online at the event in June this year

    Currently, some local authorities have temporarily waived the tax to help the industry recover

  • PRINCES REUNITED AS CHARLES III OFFICIALLY PROCLAIMED KING

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2022/09/11/princes-reunited-as-charles-iii-officially-proclaimed-king/27604

    09/11/2022, 08:03

    83.78% Shortened!

    William, who has taken the title of Prince of Wales now his father is king Charles III, earlier broke his silence with an emotional tribute to his grandmother

    Charles automatically became monarch when the queen died, but the proclamation was the latest step in the set piece 10-day programme building up to her state funeral

    They have both mourned the queen and wished Charles well, with thousands more expected to line the streets in Scotland when the queen's coffin begins its journey to London on Sunday

    "The queen has always been the queen -- always the same, no drama." Recruitment worker Dany Van Laanen, 36, said Charles has "big shoes to fill" as he replaces his mother, who was the only monarch that most in the UK had ever known

    Today, the queen's coffin will be taken by road from Balmoral to Edinburgh, where it will rest in the Palace of Holyroodhouse

    The funeral for the queen -- who came to the throne aged just 25 in 1952 -- will be a public holiday in the form of a Day of National Mourning

    ['queen', 'charles', 'day', 'king', 'royal']

    But the former Ajax star has also made a splash at United with his banter

    He’s like a Tasmanian devil

    “He and Antony have slotted into the group really well because they already know what ten Hag expects because he managed them at Ajax

    “They have both been accepted quickly by the dressing room and have given the team a lot of energy

    "The Sun", "Sun", "Sun Online" are registered trademarks or trade names of News Group Newspapers Limited

    To see all content on The Sun, please use the Site Map

    https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/man-united-cristiano-ronaldo-rashford-27961229

    09/11/2022, 07:03

    62.5% Shortened!

    Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag has started Cristiano Ronaldo in just one Premier League game so far this season, in contrast, Marcus Rashford has been named in every starting XI Manchester United’s dressing room have reportedly thrown their weight behind Marcus Rashford - and believe he’s a better option than Cristiano Ronaldo

    Rashford has been handed a regular berth in the United starting XI thanks in no small part to the summer speculation surrounding Cristiano Ronaldo

    Ronaldo was absent from United’s summer tour of Asia and Australia, making just one appearance before the competitive stuff got underway last month

    And Ten Hag has opted to use the Portuguese icon from the bench in all but one of the Red Devils’ matches so far this season

    The Sun report that with Rashford rather than Ronaldo in the team, United’s players feel less pressured and are able to express themselves more

    Read more Can United mount a title challenge? Get our FREE daily Manchester United email newsletter

  • TERENGGANU AND JDT FANS CREATE CARNIVAL-LIKE ATMOSPHERE AT BUKIT JALIL

    https://www.thestar.com.my/sport/football/2022/09/11/terengganu-and-jdt-fans-create-carnival-like-atmosphere-at-bukit-jalil

    09/11/2022, 07:03

    70.0% Shortened!

    Terengganu fan Mohd Shahrul Ikhwan Muda said they did not waste the opportunity to come to KL to support their team as it had been sometime since they qualified for a major football final

    Hopefully, this will be our time,” said Shahrul, who spent more than RM3,000 to bring his family of nine to watch the FA Cup final live

    Terengganu are playing once again in a major football final since 2011

    Interestingly, that was also the year when Terengganu last lifted the trophy after edging Kelantan 2-1 at the National Stadium in Bukit Jalil

    JDT, on the other hand, also have their eyes on the Cup for the first time since 2016

    JDT beat the now-defunct PKNS 2-1 at the Shah Alam Stadium that year and a win will erase the memories of their painful 0-2 defeat to Kuala Lumpur in the Malaysia Cup final at the same venue last year

    ['terengganu', 'fan', 'jdt', 'cup', 'final']

  • PM TRUSS TO ACCOMPANY KING CHARLES ON TOUR OF BRITAIN TO LEAD MOURNING

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2022/09/11/pm-truss-to-accompany-king-charles-on-tour-of-britain-to-lead-mourning

    09/11/2022, 03:02

    50.0% Shortened!

    Britain's King Charles III during his first audience with Prime Minister Liz Truss at Buckingham Palace, following the death of Queen Elizabeth II on Thursday, in London, Britain September 9, 2022

    Truss, who was appointed prime minister by Elizabeth on Tuesday in her last public act, was one of several senior lawmakers who swore a new oath of allegiance to the new king in a special session in parliament earlier on Saturday following the queen's death

    She was also present, along with six former prime ministers, senior bishops and several politicians, when Charles, 73, was officially proclaimed Britain's new king in a colourful ceremony laden with pageantry and tradition

    She later met Charles along with other senior ministers at Buckingham Palace

    "In terms of the prime minister's involvement, she will join the king as he leads the national mourning across the United Kingdom, attending services of reflection in Scotland on Monday afternoon, in Northern Ireland on Tuesday, and Wales on Friday," the spokesman told reporters

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    (From left) Kate, the Princess of Wales, Prince William, Prince of Wales, Prince Harry and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex walk to meet members of the public at Windsor Castle, following the death of Queen Elizabeth II on Thursday, in Windsor, England, Saturday, Sept 10, 2022

    Harry and Meghan joined William and Kate in public together for the first time since Commonwealth Day on March 9, 2020, as they inspected flowers and balloons before a walkabout to meet mourners gathered outside the venue on Saturday

    A royal source said William, the new Prince of Wales, asked his brother and his wife to join them in viewing the tributes

    The duke and duchess held hands as they looked at the tributes, with Harry at one point affectionately putting his hand on Meghan's back

    William and Kate and Harry and Meghan then greeted well-wishes at Windsor Castle with a number holding up mobile phones to take a photo of the royals

    He said mistakes in water management had left Lat Krabang Road flooded with no relief in sight

    Suchatvee said the BMA strategy did not include lowering the levels of Klong Prawet and tributaries such as Klong Lam Pla Thiew, the main drainage network for eastern Bangkok

  • EIGHTY-YEAR-OLD COFFEE SHOP IN KUALA KANGSAR STILL DRAWS IN THE CROWDS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/life/2022/09/11/eighty-year-old-coffee-shop-in-kuala-kangsar-still-draws-in-the-crowds/27665

    09/11/2022

    62.5% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA KANGSAR, Sept 11 — A vintage bread and coffee shop that is over 80 years old, still remains to be popular among youngsters here, despite the huge number of hipster cafes mushrooming everywhere

    Located in Perak’s royal town, this shop has been the preferred choice of local and foreign visitors who come here specially to enjoy its home-made bread and delicious ‘kaw’ coffee, amid the warm and rusty ambience

    According to manager Leong Tean Chia, 60, the shop where Double Lion Restaurant had been operating has remained until today because the building materials used then were of high quality and the furniture were built to last

    Leong added that another factor why the restaurant is still in business today is because the quality of its home-made bread has remained consistent until today using the same recipe which has been passed down through generations

    “We will always take care of the freshness of the ingredients used to maintain the quality of our bread so that customers are satisfied with the food here

    Meanwhile, shop assistant Ah Ling, 55, who has been employed there less than five years, said working at the shop had been very enjoyable

    ['bread', 'shop', 'restaurant', 'use', 'quality']

    About Us Advertise KUALA KANGSAR, Sept 11 — A vintage bread and coffee shop that is over 80 years old, still remains to be popular among youngsters here, despite the huge number of hipster cafes mushrooming everywhere

    Located in Perak’s royal town, this shop has been the preferred choice of local and foreign visitors who come here specially to enjoy its home-made bread and delicious ‘kaw’ coffee, amid the warm and rusty ambience

    According to manager Leong Tean Chia, 60, the shop where Double Lion Restaurant had been operating has remained until today because the building materials used then were of high quality and the furniture were built to last

    Leong added that another factor why the restaurant is still in business today is because the quality of its home-made bread has remained consistent until today using the same recipe which has been passed down through generations

    “We will always take care of the freshness of the ingredients used to maintain the quality of our bread so that customers are satisfied with the food here

    Meanwhile, shop assistant Ah Ling, 55, who has been employed there less than five years, said working at the shop had been very enjoyable

    ['bread', 'shop', 'restaurant', 'use', 'quality']
